title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
Hi,
I have an A1304 820-2375-A, that has no power. I think that the problem may be in the PPBUS_G3H, that seams to low, but i'm not sure.

I get the following voltages:

PP3V42_G3H - 3.4V
PP18V5_G3H - 19V
PPDCIN_G3H - 19.5V
PPBUS_R_G3H  - 8.4V
PPBUS_G3H  - 8.4V

Can you help?

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
PPBUS_G3H looks good.
MCP platform starts only pressing power button.

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
OK.
PP1V05_S5 - 1.09V
PP3V3_S5 - 0.1V

I think that it is the PP3V3_S5, am I right? If so, where from here?

On pin 21 of the U7600 i get 3.4V

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message: Diode mode to ground at L7620?

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
Good enough to get 3V3_S5 at L7620.
If not, check all surrounding resistors.
You may need to change U7600 and/or Q7620.

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message: Hi, now i have 3.3V on  L7620, but still no power

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
Press power button first.
Check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L at same time.

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
I don't have a drop pulse on  PM_PWRBTN_L  (3.4V steady).
Can it be the power button? How can i power it from the board?

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
Use the logic...
Solder an wire to SMC_ONOFF_L line.

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
With the  SMC_ONOFF_L trigger it power its on.
I wanted to make sure if the problem is the button, or the connector, but can't figure out witch pin on the connector enables the power on. Can you help?

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
Hi,
Ii seams that it powers on (it has fan spin), but i don't get any image, even on external monitor, and don't have any USB activity (PEN doesn't blink).
CPU gets hot, and i get voltages on all big coils...
Any idea?

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
Try known good BIOS.

What did you change to fix 3V3_S5 problem?

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
Hi. 
I didn't change anything yet.  Just conected and disconected the cables, made some measures, and it starts working by it self...
Do you have an known good BIOS (I have one, but not sure if it is good?

title: A1304 820-2375-A
message:
It was already posted on the forum...
